text: Mendoza zebra is a jumping spider species that lives in Russia. The male was first described in 1992. The species was originally allocated to the genus Marpissa, but was transferred to Mendoza in 1999. ==References== Category:Salticidae Category:Spiders of Russia Category:Spiders described in 1992 Category:Taxa named by Wanda Wesołowska
title: Mendoza zebra
